Hello blank fragment internal_storage Our app collects user account data which includes email address, name to log in the app. This information is required as part of registration process to access our service and it is also used to auto populate relevant fields in the course of interface of our app. Our app also collects mobile number for verification to check the active SIM status of the device, uniquely identify you and prevent fraud and unauthorized access.
We collect and monitor only your non personal sms related to bank transactions, names of the transacting parties, 0 description of transaction and amount of transaction for the purpose of performing credit risk assessment. No personal sms data is collected, stored. As part of the loan journey, we collect all of your phone contacts which includes their contact names, phone number, account types and labels to enrich your financial profile. We use this data to determine your social network from your phonebook contacts and identify fraudulent contacts in your network. This helps us in detecting fraud loan application and reducing credit risk. We collect and monitor the information about the location of your device to provide serviceability of your loan application, to reduce the risk associated with your loan application and to provide pre-approved customized loan offers. This also helps us to verify the address, make a better credit risk decision and expedite your KYC process. – We collect each installed applications metadata information, which includes the application name, package name, installed time, updated time, version name and version code of each installed application on your device to assess your credit worthiness by analyzing the type of apps you use and provide you with pre approved customized loans. Our app collects and monitors specific information about your device including your hardware model, RAM, storage, IMEI, serial number, SSAID, SIM information that includes network operator, roaming state, MNC and MCC codes, Wi-Fi information that includes MAC address and mobile network information to uniquely identify the device and ensure that no unauthorized device acts on your behalf to prevent fraud. This also helps us in enriching your credit profile and assess your creditworthiness. We need your camera access to capture your selfie for identify verification and collection of scanned documents for KYC process With this permission, you will be able to upload the documents for completing the KYC process for a faster approval and disbursal of loan. This helps in providing a smoother and seamless experience while using the application.
//about us ClikFin is an innovative, user-friendly, and scalable digital money lending platform for instant personal loans. Our platform offers quickest cash loans to a self-employed or a salaried user with minimal documents and basic details. Our primary aim is to ease customers’ financial hurdles and make funds instantly accessible to all customers who are in financial need. Our leading digital platform turns the tedious, time-taking, and cumbersome conventional loan origination process into a 5-minutes, seamless, and frictionless process. Our team at ClikFin strives continuously to deliver the most hassle-free money borrowing experience to customers. Our platform, both web-based and mobile application, is designed in a consumer-friendly fashion to provide personal financing services with just a few clicks. We are committed to providing a flexible and affordable loan in the shortest possible time, thereby bringing you one step closer to accomplishing your personal financial requirements or goals.
